title: ICE with `const_evaluatable_checked` and lifetime parameter

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![allow(incomplete_features)] #![feature(const_generics, const_evaluatable_checked)] pub struct Ref<'a, const NUM: usize>(&'a i32); impl<'a, const NUM: usize> Ref<'a, NUM> { pub fn foo(r: Ref<'a, A>) -> Self where ([(); NUM - A], [(); A - NUM]): Sized, { Self::bar(r) } pub fn bar(r: Ref<'a, A>) -> Self where ([(); NUM - A], [(); A - NUM]): Sized, { Self(r.0) } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.54.0-nightly (676ee1472 2021-05-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 676ee14729462585b969bbc52f32c307403f4126 commit-date: 2021-05-06 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.54.0-nightly LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ```thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/676ee14729462585b969bbc52f32c307403f4126/library/std/src/panic.rs:59:5 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.54.0-nightly (676ee1472 2021-05-06) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [typeck] type-checking `::foo` #1 [typeck_item_bodies] type-checking all item bodies end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error error: could not compile `ice-minimal` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. ```
Backtrace

```stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: rustc_middle::ich::impls_ty:: for rustc_middle::ty::sty::RegionKind>::hash_stable 8: std::thread::local::LocalKey::with 9: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::dep_node::DepNode::construct 10: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query 12: ::try_unify_abstract_consts 13: rustc_trait_selection::traits::fulfill::FulfillProcessor::progress_changed_obligations 14: rustc_data_structures::obligation_forest::ObligationForest::process_obligations 15: ::select_where_possible 16: rustc_typeck::check::fn_ctxt::_impl::::resolve_vars_with_obligations 17: rustc_typeck::check::fn_ctxt::_impl::::structurally_resolved_type 18: rustc_typeck::check::callee::::check_call 19: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_expr_kind 20: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_expr_with_expectation 21: rustc_typeck::check::fn_ctxt::checks::::check_block_with_expected 22: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_expr_with_expectation 23: rustc_typeck::check::expr::::check_return_expr 24: rustc_typeck::check::check::check_fn 25: rustc_typeck::check::inherited::InheritedBuilder::enter 26: rustc_typeck::check::typeck 27: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 28: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 29: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 30: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 31: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 32: ::typeck 33: rustc_middle::ty::::par_body_owners 34: rustc_typeck::check::typeck_item_bodies 35: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 36: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 37: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 38: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 39: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 40: ::typeck_item_bodies 41: rustc_session::utils::::time 42: rustc_typeck::check_crate 43: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 44: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 45: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 46: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 47: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 48: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 49: ::analysis 50: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 51: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 52: rustc_span::with_source_map 53: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 54: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
